name: vital-throw
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Makes the user’s move last,
but it never misses.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Makes the user’s move last,
but it never misses.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
Makes the user
attack after the
foe. In return,
it will not miss.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user allows the
foe to attack first.
In return, this throw
move is guaranteed
not to miss.

not to miss.
